summary: All three requirements are implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed in backend/main.mo with stable adminPrincipal, initAdmin(), and assertIsAdmin() auto-assign logic. REQ-2 is addressed by getAllCases using assertIsAdmin. REQ-3 is addressed in useCaseQueries.ts with useInitAdmin hook and dependency chaining, and in CasesManager.tsx. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle canister upgrade state migration.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request did not request a separate migration module file. REQ-1 only asked for stable state storage in main.mo. The migration.mo file goes beyond what was specified.

hallucinated_features.description: A dedicated AdminCases page (frontend/src/pages/AdminCases.tsx) was added as a full standalone page with its own case management UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly listed 'Redesigning the Case Management UI layout' as a non-goal and only asked for updates to CasesManager and useCaseQueries.ts. Adding a new full page was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: getAdminPrincipal() public query method was added to expose the stored admin principal.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asked for a public endpoint to retrieve the admin principal. This was not mentioned in any REQ.
